title: Pop star Morgana Concept

embed.description: For a long time I have wanted to see more Pop star skins in league and strangely enough Morgana was the one who came to mind.

body:
I have really wanted to see more Popstar skins in league for so long
and I dunno why but Morgana came to mind. I have never drawn visual effects before so please bear 
with me on the quality, I did my best.

I'm still working on the actual skin design but I just wanted to show off what I pictured
her effects would be like.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

also I'm an artist, I can do as I please

You literally said "I don't care" to a comment in which I said that I didn't care? You don't care that I don't care? Cool, not sure why this thread is still going.

A lot of people make skin concepts for a few reasons, not to just be considered by Riot. A lot of creators/fan-made skin concepts are just people who love to create. The designer is obviously a fan of League, and a fan of Morgana. She wanted to contribute something in his/her own way and then share that with people who ALSO LIKE Morgana and League. The creator had an idea and wanted to bring it to life, then share the idea with others. There's nothing wrong with that and I see no reason for you to shit on her for it.  

Skins don't always make sense or fit with the champions, sometimes they're for fun by Riot. For example: "Kitty Kat Katarina". Do you really think an assassin (part of being an assassin is being undetected and blending into surroundings) would be dressed in an all white, skimpy cat costume? How about the "food" line of skins featuring Pantheon, Leona, Olaf and Akali? Do those make sense? How about Definitely Not Velkoz? Not EVERY skin makes sense, sometimes Riot just likes to have fun and the community enjoys them. 

Stop being rude, and either say something nice or say nothing at all. You learn this way of thought in kindergarten.

?? wat? They look a lot alike. Sure they use different weapons, but so do the rest of them.. She's got the purple thing and the haircut going on, and generally the whole demeanor. I'm not trying to say that Riot has made skins that don't make total sense in the past, but I disagree that SG Syndra is one of them.

It's not like they're trying to follow the Sailor Moon story exactly that's not the point of the skins. Uranus and Neptune (MF and Soraka) weren't exactly "puff girls" in the show, and they aren't here, they're the more mature and less naive guardians and can be downright brutal at times if the lore we're given is anything to go by. 

I hardly think Syndra would fit with the original team, but she fits in just fine with the new one, and she's implied by everything we are given to be somewhat separate anyway, (it straight up says most of her team is suspicious of her) which matches Saturn as one of the outer planets. She was technically on their side most of the time but she had her own goals and motives that were sometimes less than savoury and always questioned.
